text: avare nam pantrant geatrannalayi athava samuhannalayi vibhajiccu. musayeat addehattinre janata kutivellam ceadiccu. appeal nam addehatteat nirdesiccu: "ni ninre vatikeant parakkallil atikkuka.â€ annane atilninn pantrant uravakal peattiyealuki. orea vibhagattinum tannal vellam kutikkenta sthalametenn manas'silakkan sadhiccu. avarkku nam karmeghankeant tanaleki. mannayum salvayum irakkikkeatuttu. nam nirdesiccu: "nam ninnalkku nalkiya uttama padarthannalilninn tinnukealluka.â€ tannalute ceytikalilute avar namukkearu dreahavum varuttiyittilla. avarettanneyan avar dreahiccukeantirunnat
